text:
League 1
ASSE - Monaco streaming, where to see the match?
On the occasion of the 12th day of Ligue 1, AS Saint-Etienne receives Monaco at the Geoffroy-Guichard stadium. A match broadcast live on television on Canal + this Sunday, November 3 from 21 hours, French time, but also to follow live streaming on iPhone, iPad, PC, Mac or Android.
03 Nov 2019, 04:15 by Charlie Creteur



Saint-Etienne has not lost since the enthronement of Claude Puel but has yet to prove! The Greens conceded the draw at home last weekend against Amiens on the score of 2-2. Khazri opened the scoring before the break (45th, 1-0) before Mendoza's equalizer (68th, 1-1), Akolo's 2nd goal scored by Akolo (76th, 1-2) and finally Dibassy's CSC ( 80th, 2-2). The clash of Sunday's 12th match against Monaco should be a good test before the second Europa League clash with Olekandriya.







ASSE - Monaco streaming




Leonardo Jardim + 18 ðŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This match of the 12th day of Ligue 1 between AS Saint-Etienne and AS Monaco is broadcast on French television on Canal + this Sunday, November 3 at 21 hours, French time. A match that you will also be able to watch live streaming video

Either via the subscription service (thus paying) My Channel available on PC & Mac via an internet browser.



Either via the iPhone, iPad and Android My Channel apps.
